AddNotificationChannel.name: AddNotificationChannel
AddNotificationChannel.description: Grants permission to add a notification channel to DevOps Guru

DeleteInsight.name: DeleteInsight
DeleteInsight.description: Grants permission to delete specified insight in your account

DescribeAccountHealth.name: DescribeAccountHealth
DescribeAccountHealth.description: Grants permission to view the health of operations in your AWS account

DescribeAccountOverview.name: DescribeAccountOverview
DescribeAccountOverview.description: Grants permission to view the health of operations within a time range in your AWS account

DescribeAnomaly.name: DescribeAnomaly
DescribeAnomaly.description: Grants permission to list the details of a specified anomaly

DescribeEventSourcesConfig.name: DescribeEventSourcesConfig
DescribeEventSourcesConfig.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about event sources for DevOps Guru

DescribeFeedback.name: DescribeFeedback
DescribeFeedback.description: Grants permission to view the feedback details of a specified insight

DescribeInsight.name: DescribeInsight
DescribeInsight.description: Grants permission to list the details of a specified insight

DescribeOrganizationHealth.name: DescribeOrganizationHealth
DescribeOrganizationHealth.description: Grants permission to view the health of operations in your organization

DescribeOrganizationOverview.name: DescribeOrganizationOverview
DescribeOrganizationOverview.description: Grants permission to view the health of operations within a time range in your organization

DescribeOrganizationResourceCollectionHe.name: DescribeOrganizationResourceCollectionHealth
DescribeOrganizationResourceCollectionHe.description: Grants permission to view the health of operations for each AWS CloudFormation stack or AWS Services or accounts specified in DevOps Guru in your organization

DescribeResourceCollectionHealth.name: DescribeResourceCollectionHealth
DescribeResourceCollectionHealth.description: Grants permission to view the health of operations for each AWS CloudFormation stack specified in DevOps Guru

DescribeServiceIntegration.name: DescribeServiceIntegration
DescribeServiceIntegration.description: Grants permission to view the integration status of services that can be integrated with DevOps Guru

GetCostEstimation.name: GetCostEstimation
GetCostEstimation.description: Grants permission to list service resource cost estimates

GetResourceCollection.name: GetResourceCollection
GetResourceCollection.description: Grants permission to list AWS CloudFormation stacks that DevOps Guru is configured to use

ListAnomaliesForInsight.name: ListAnomaliesForInsight
ListAnomaliesForInsight.description: Grants permission to list anomalies of a given insight in your account

ListAnomalousLogGroups.name: ListAnomalousLogGroups
ListAnomalousLogGroups.description: Grants permission to list log anomalies of a given insight in your account

ListEvents.name: ListEvents
ListEvents.description: Grants permission to list resource events that are evaluated by DevOps Guru

ListInsights.name: ListInsights
ListInsights.description: Grants permission to list insights in your account

ListMonitoredResources.name: ListMonitoredResources
ListMonitoredResources.description: Grants permission to list resource monitored by DevOps Guru in your account

ListNotificationChannels.name: ListNotificationChannels
ListNotificationChannels.description: Grants permission to list notification channels configured for DevOps Guru in your account

ListOrganizationInsights.name: ListOrganizationInsights
ListOrganizationInsights.description: Grants permission to list insights in your organization

ListRecommendations.name: ListRecommendations
ListRecommendations.description: Grants permission to list a specified insight's recommendations

PutFeedback.name: PutFeedback
PutFeedback.description: Grants permission to submit a feedback to DevOps Guru

RemoveNotificationChannel.name: RemoveNotificationChannel
RemoveNotificationChannel.description: Grants permission to remove a notification channel from DevOps Guru

SearchInsights.name: SearchInsights
SearchInsights.description: Grants permission to search insights in your account

SearchOrganizationInsights.name: SearchOrganizationInsights
SearchOrganizationInsights.description: Grants permission to search insights in your organization

StartCostEstimation.name: StartCostEstimation
StartCostEstimation.description: Grants permission to start the creation of an estimate of the monthly cost

UpdateEventSourcesConfig.name: UpdateEventSourcesConfig
UpdateEventSourcesConfig.description: Grants permission to update an event source for DevOps Guru

UpdateResourceCollection.name: UpdateResourceCollection
UpdateResourceCollection.description: Grants permission to update the list of AWS CloudFormation stacks that are used to specify which AWS resources in your account are analyzed by DevOps Guru

UpdateServiceIntegration.name: UpdateServiceIntegration
UpdateServiceIntegration.description: Grants permission to enable or disable a service that integrates with DevOps Guru
